comments.body: Did we need to change this to `None`? This is  quirk between type checkers and docs here. :/

Unfortunately yes, the below line calls it without a session.

https://github.com/apache/airflow/blob/aa8a30099884efbf6fd5fb276f3dc6a310866aba/airflow/www/views.py#L184

I mean it looks like it does, but the decorator takes care of that.

So interaction between our provide_session and typecheckers then.
